title: Sdk attribute is not showing up for Project or Import in Project Schema
body: The `Sdk` attribute is missing from the schema for `<Project/>` and `<Import/>` elements so you do not get IntelliSense for them.

nodes.body: https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/pull/2038/files#diff-49aefd83a73e9253b89c51d2a721ff5b addresses this for `<Import>` elements, but `Project` still needs it.
Internal PR to pick this up is https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/MSBuild/_git/VS/pullrequest/66821.
